B |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = WGA32403 |page_start_date = 07/25/2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/WatchGuard_AP320 |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = enterprise access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TOR-C75 |icid = 8252A-C75 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9550; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 720 <!-- 720 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = 2 |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12835FMI-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68B16CWQD-25H; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8334; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:7F |oui = 00:90:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ-45 console,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, populated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microsemi;LX5535;;3;,,, 30W 802.3af/at PoE Powered Device Controller;Akros Silicon;AS1138;;1;,,, 150V N-Channel MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP15T15GM;;1;,,, Single USB Port Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2141D;;1;,,, 1-Channel Photocoupler;Lite-On;LTV-356T;;1;,,, 1.5A Bridge Rectifier;Diodes Inc;DF1501S;;2;,,, RS-232 Driver Receiver;Sipex;SP3220;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Lite-On |manuf_model = WP838I |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 2018 |fccapprovdate = 06/13/2016 |estreldate = 08/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 654522022790 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01GYM7R9Y |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B01GYM7JVA |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Lite-On WM863 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9890; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Qualcomm Atheros]]'' QCA9550 [[MIPS 74K]] (@720MHz) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 32MB SPI NOR Flash *WiFi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9890 (802.11an+ac) *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 1.5A via barrel or 802.3af PoE
==Links of Interest== [https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/hardware%20guides/AP320_Hardware_Guide.pdf Hardware Guide]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/watchguard/watchguard_ap320 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 21.02.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
